article_title: Kim Kardashian App Takeover! The Government Tweets About Their C-List Status & Has The Best Reaction EVER!
article_text:
Ever since the goddess Beyoncé dropped Lemonade with those controversial lyrics about "Becky with the good hair", there has been a lot of commotion from fans about who "Becky" is and whether or not Jay Z cheated on Bey!

While we've heard news that HOV and his wife have finished their joint album that's supposedly a response to Lemonade, Jay decided to address the album first in a remix to Fat Joe's All The Way Up -- which of course exclusively dropped on TIDAL!

Related: Beyoncé Officially Has Her Own Holiday In Minnesota!

In the first song that the rapper has leant his voice to for a full verse in about two years, Z gives a shoutout to his lady love's music, rapping:
